Source.Name: xdg-utils
Source.Summary: Tools to assist with desktop integration tasks
Source.Description: xdg-utils is a a set of command line tools that assist applications with a variety of desktop integration tasks. It is required for Linux Standards Base (LSB) conformance.

Package.Name: xdg-utils
Package.Summary: Tools to assist with desktop integration tasks
Package.Description: xdg-utils is a a set of command line tools that assist applications with a variety of desktop integration tasks. It is required for Linux Standards Base (LSB) conformance.
